EmailTemplate.name: Phones Escalation Follow-up Proactive
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Thank you for calling us. Please note this case has been escalated to our next level support. If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
